rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a reception area that greets visitors. Includes shoe racks and coat closet in accordance with Vastu for positive energy flow.
Open-plan living room adjacent to the dining area, well-lit and featuring large windows facing east for auspicious morning light.
Dining area integrated with the living room. Vastu principles ensure that dining space faces north, avoiding any direct alignment with the main door.

A dedicated home office on the ground floor designed for a family of four, located in a quiet corner with ample natural light and minimal distractions. Vastu advises placing it north-east to enhance productivity.
Colonial style kitchen with integrated pantry and modern amenities, positioned adjacent to the dining area. According to Vastu, the kitchen is ideally located in the southeast section of the house.
Master bedroom featuring an ensuite bathroom. The room is designed with a colonial aesthetic and placed in the southwest quadrant to promote restful sleep as per Vastu recommendations.
Additional bedroom for guest or child, situated adjacent to master bedroom but maintaining separate access. Also follows Vastu guidelines by being located towards the west.
Primary bathroom attached to the master bedroom with a separate ensuite option, designed in accordance with local norms and Vastu orientation (southwest)

openings.description: Main entrance door aligning with the front facade facing north for positive energy as per Vastu.
Garage entrance located on the west side of the property, ensuring easy access while preserving the aesthetic of the colonial design.
Large windows in the living room and office area facing east for optimal morning light and positive energy flow.

rooms.description: A mezzanine or split-level space connecting to the roof terrace, designed as a transitional area with access from both the living room and bedrooms. Vastu advises this area to be used for informal gatherings.

openings.description: Staircases connecting ground floor to first floor, designed in a colonial style with open spaces and good circulation.

rooms.description: A spacious rooftop terrace offering panoramic views. Features outdoor seating, greenery, and a relaxation area. Vastu principles recommend this space to be aligned east for positive energy during sunrise.

openings.description: Access point from the upper level staircase leading directly to the rooftop terrace.
Double car garage door providing secure and easy access for two vehicles, designed in colonial style with functional layout.

intended_use: Residential and home office for a family of four

building_norms.local: Compliant with Indian residential building codes
building_norms.vastu_principles: Integrated Vastu guidelines ensuring positive energy flow, proper room orientations, and harmonious space utilization.
